first_para: George Edward Howarth (born 29 June 1949) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Knowsley North from 1986 until 1997, and since then for its replacement Knowsley North and Sefton East and Knowsley from 2010

full.extract: George Edward Howarth (born 29 June 1949) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Knowsley North from 1986 until 1997, and since then for its replacement Knowsley North and Sefton East and Knowsley from 2010
full.title: George Howarth
